title: American Gangster
desc: A powerful crime drama set in the 1970s, depicting the rise of a drug lord.

title: Breaking Bad
desc: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer navigates the criminal underworld.

title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
desc: The saga continues as the Resistance fights against the First Order in a galaxy far, far away.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy, Vol.2
desc: The misfit crew of Guardians embarks on another adventure to unravel the mysteries of Peter Quill's parentage.

title: The Dark Knight
desc: Batman faces off against the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to create chaos in Gotham City.

title: Black Panther
desc: T'Challa, the Black Panther, returns to the fictional African nation of Wakanda to take the throne after his father's death.
